nova6_crawler.name: Nova-6 Crawler
nova6_crawler.description: A slow-moving zombie that explodes in a cloud of toxic gas upon death, dealing poison damage to all characters.

hell_hound.name: Hell Hound
hell_hound.description: A fast-moving special zombie that explodes in a burst of flames upon death, dealing fire damage to all characters.

parasites.name: Parasites
parasites.description: Small, fast-moving flying zombies that attack on special rounds. They have low health and attack power but can overwhelm characters with their numbers.

denizen.name: Denizen
denizen.description: A small, sneaky zombie that attacks with its claws.

vermin.name: Vermin
vermin.description: A small spider-like zombie that attacks in large groups on special rounds. They have low health and attack power but can overwhelm characters with their numbers.

keeper.name: Keeper
keeper.description: The Keeper has low health and does not deal a lot of damage, making them a relatively insignificant foe in terms of pure combat. Any weapon can kill a Keeper quickly.

standard_zombie.name: Standard Zombie
standard_zombie.description: A regular zombie with no special abilities.
